content:
The project title is " Design & Build a Rubber Band Powered Vehicle". Students will need to design and build a rubber band powered vehicle. They will also need to perform some investigations on their vehicle to see what can be done to make it travel further. They need to include the variables to be changed and variables to be kept constant etc. the learning objectives are: • use scientific inquiry skills such as posing questions, planning and carrying out investigations, evaluating experimental results and communicating findings.
• show attitudes such as creativity, objectivity, integrity, open-mindedness and perseverance in carrying out scientific inquiry
• use their creativity and problem-solving skills to design and build a Rubber Band Powered Vehicle.
